name: Insurgence
description:
Those who obey MUTHER survive. Those who don't are killed, or get their memory erased.  You are Artificial Intelligence Unit 0792 and your decisions might help shape the fate of this twisted world.

Made for the #confessionjam May 2019 in bitsy with the bitsy HD hack. 

Made using:
Bitsy by Adam Le Doux
Bitsy hd by VonBednar (FredBednarski )
Transparent sprites and exit-from-dialogue hacks by Sean LeBlanc

Background music: Retro Dreamscape by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)
